meanings.sent1: The carpenter redrilled the hole to make it deeper.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic redrilled the screw hole to fix the loose screw.
meanings.sent3: After the mistake, he redrilled the hole, making sure to measure twice.
meanings.sent4: She redrilled her study habits to improve her grades.
meanings.sent5: The gardener redrilled the irrigation system to ensure proper watering.

meanings.definition: To bore or make a hole in something again
meanings.sent1: The construction worker redrilled the foundation for added support.
meanings.sent2: The geologist redrilled the core sample to gather more accurate data.
meanings.sent3: The chef redrilled the pineapple for a creative fruit display.
meanings.sent4: The artist redrilled the canvas to create a unique pattern.
meanings.sent5: The plumber redrilled the pipe to fix the leak.
